public class DetailsDialog
extends javax.swing.JComponent

showDialog

public static void showDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.Throwable e,
                              java.util.Locale locale)
Convenient method for error messages. Use null title to display the default title provided by resourceBundle.

Parameters:
owner - The Window from which the dialog is displayed.
title - The dialog title, null for default error title.
message - The error message to display, null for Throwable#getMessage().
e - The throwable used for details.
locale - Locale used for default title and button text.

showDialog

public static void showDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.Throwable e)
Convenient method for error messages. Use null title to display the default title provided by resourceBundle.

Parameters:
owner - The Window from which the dialog is displayed.
title - The dialog title, null for default error title.
message - The error message to display, null for Throwable#getMessage().
e - The throwable used for details.

showDialog

public static void showDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String details,
                              int type,
                              java.util.Locale locale)
Convenient method for messages. Use null title to display the default title provided by resourceBundle. Valid types are DetailsDialog.INFO_TYPE, DetailsDialog.WARNING_TYPE, DetailsDialog.ERROR_TYPE, DetailsDialog.UNKNOWN_TYPE

Parameters:
owner - The Window from which the dialog is displayed.
title - The dialog title.
message - The message to display.
details - The details text.
type - The type of message.
locale - Locale used for default title and button text.

showDialog

public static void showDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String details,
                              int type)
Convenient method for messages. Use null title to display the default title provided by resourceBundle. Valid types are DetailsDialog.INFO_TYPE, DetailsDialog.WARNING_TYPE, DetailsDialog.ERROR_TYPE, DetailsDialog.UNKNOWN_TYPE

Parameters:
owner - The Window from which the dialog is displayed.
title - The dialog title.
message - The message to display.
details - The details text.
type - The type of message.

createHyperlinkListener

protected javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener createHyperlinkListener(boolean detailsPane)
Creates a hyperlink listener for the message and details panel. The default implementation opens the URL by a browser.

Parameters:
detailsPane - true - means create HyperlinkListener for the details panel false - means create HyperlinkListener for the message panel
